sections: Donating to win this GT500 is the easiest decision you'll make all day!
What could be better than buying a 750-horsepower
? Well here’s your chance and the best part is that you can enter to win for as little as a $25 donation to Cruise for a Cause.

As a limited edition model, only 100 Ford Mustang GT500SEs will be built for each model year and only one of the 2021 examples will carry both a Shelby serial number and a Cruise for a Cause Hope Edition Serial number. That makes this Antimatter Blue

“HOPE” Edition a true one-of-one example but there is more to this car than just a rare name. It is equipped with nearly every optional package, including the Technology Package and the Carbon Fiber Track Package.

treatment abides by the same school of the thought implemented in all Shelby vehicles. Reduce weight, improve handling, increase power.  On top of the additional 40-horsepower gained with the addition of a Performance Supercharger pulley, a high volume supercharger intercooler, and a high volume supercharger heat exchanger, the Signature Edition also includes a re-calibrated suspension and a lightweight hood. Its slick black leather upholstery is finished with an embroidered Carrol Shelby signature and a CSM dash plate.

is hosted by Cruise for a Cause and all donations benefit cancer research and outreach. A $25 donation will get you five entries but the more you donate the more entries you get. For example, a $2,500 donation is worth 1,350 entries and as a bonus, Motorious readers get additional promo tickets as well. This is an awesome opportunity to build up some good karma for doing your part to help rid the world of a disease that affects far too many people and you could possibly be rewarded with one
